author: Nick Nairn
method: Pour the olive oil into a bowl and stir in the garlic and orange zest. Stir in the chilli flakes then add the black olives. Stir again to coat in the oil. Transfer the olives to a serving dish and sprinkle with a few cumin seeds, to serve.
ingredients: 1 tbsp olive oil,  1 clove garlic, peeled and finely chopped,  1 orange, grated zest only,  Â¼ tsp chilli flakes,  110g/4oz black olives, pitted,  cumin seeds, to serve
